Home > Activity Agenda > Venue

Venue

Palais de Chine

The French name "Palais de Chine" refers to a palace (Palais) vs China (Chine), which is itself a mix of Chinese and Western cultures. The design and decorations of Palais de Chine further reveal various kinds of mix & match design style. Whether it is traditional, modern, simple or luxurious style, all are perfectly blended together at Palais de Chine.

 

Room Descartes & Rousseau equipped with high-tech facilities. The glass walls provide diffused natural lighting that creates a vibrant atmosphere in the rooms. All rooms can be customized for various purposes such as meeting, seminar, workshop and press conference.

Location: 5F., No. 3, Section 1, Chengde Road, Taipei 103 , Taiwan
